name: SKELEMATICS
description:
Popular phone, among skeletons, got broke. You need to repair it by finding the broken parts from the schematics, but you have only three extra parts. Try to find where the malfunction starts from! 

CONTROLS:
Investigate schematics : Arrow Keys
Repair parts (marked as red) : Mouse left click
Reset the view : spacebar

CREDITS:

Arhi Makkonen - Art & Design

Jonne Harja - Skull & Sounds

Antti Pohjanen - Programming

Special thanks to: Brandon Startz (helping with the sounds)
